com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart

Class ChartContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart.ChartContainer

  • public class ChartContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    A pane that contains a left pane to display prices, indicators and volumes. It contains a chart plotter, a vertical axis and information pane on the top.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Nested Class Summary
